solution_line_template: 2 pounds of steak will cost Ken {pounds_of_steak} * {price_per_pound} = <<{pounds_of_steak}*{price_per_pound}={cost_of_steak}>>{cost_of_steak} dollars
Subtracting that amount from $20 will give {payment_amount} - {cost_of_steak} = <<{payment_amount}-{cost_of_steak}={change_back}>>{change_back} dollars
